title: Form: Application to naturalise as a British citizen: form AN
text:
16   Form to apply for citizenship by naturalisation if you are living in the UK. Documents PDF , 425KB , 30 pages This file may not be suitable for users of assistive technology. Request an accessible format. If you use assistive technology (such as a screen reader) and need a version of this document in a more accessible format, please email . Please tell us what format you need. It will help us if you say what assistive technology you use. PDF , 191KB , 21 pages This file may not be suitable for users of assistive technology. Request an accessible format. If you use assistive technology (such as a screen reader) and need a version of this document in a more accessible format, please email . Please tell us what format you need. It will help us if you say what assistive technology you use. PDF , 465KB , 20 pages This file may not be suitable for users of assistive technology. Request an accessible format. If you use assistive technology (such as a screen reader) and need a version of this document in a more accessible format, please email . Please tell us what format you need. It will help us if you say what assistive technology you use. Details 
Use this form to apply for British citizenship by naturalisation if you have permission to live in the UK permanently and have been living here for the required number of years. 
You should read both the Guide AN and Booklet AN. Guide AN gives you information to help you with the form. Booklet AN gives you more specific information about requirements. Document information
